entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} leaves his room to head{F801}for Aquila Statue Plaza.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} leaves his room to head{F801}for Aquila Statue Plaza.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Many Samurai are gathered in the plaza.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Many Samurai are gathered in the plaza.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,59001}{F843,0}... You could have stayed{F801}home to rest, you know...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,3}{F813,0,59001}{F843,0}... You could have stayed{F801}home to rest, you know...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,59002}After what happened, I can hardly{F801}imagine what you must be thinking.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,59002}After what happened, I can hardly{F801}imagine what you must be thinking.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,59003}It's because of the shock he's had{F801}that it's better to move around than{F801}stay cooped up in his room.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,59003}It's because of the shock he's had{F801}that it's better to move around than{F801}stay cooped up in his room.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,59005}I now call this emergency meeting to{F801}order that we might--{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,1,1,1}{F813,0,59005}I now call this emergency meeting to{F801}order that we might--{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Monk\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,59006}Please, Hope. This is an important{F801}matter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59007}Since I am the Abbot of this Monastery,{F801}I shall make the announcement.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Monk\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,59006}Please, Hope. This is an important{F801}matter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59007}Since I am the Abbot of this Monastery,{F801}I shall make the announcement.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,59009}Through all of your diligence in{F801}what transpired at Kiccigiorgi, a{F801}startling truth has come to light.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,59009}Through all of your diligence in{F801}what transpired at Kiccigiorgi, a{F801}startling truth has come to light.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59012}For we who are blessed with God's love{F801}to degenerate into demons is a grave{F801}situation.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59012}For we who are blessed with God's love{F801}to degenerate into demons is a grave{F801}situation.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59013}The books she scatters like seed are{F801}written in the same mystic script{F801}as that seen in the Gauntlets.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59014}We of the Monastery have reason to{F801}suspect that the Black Samurai is in{F801}league with the Unclean Ones.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59013}The books she scatters like seed are{F801}written in the same mystic script{F801}as that seen in the Gauntlets.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59014}We of the Monastery have reason to{F801}suspect that the Black Samurai is in{F801}league with the Unclean Ones.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,59015}Hoy, Jonathan. Who are these{F801}Unclean Ones?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,59015}Hoy, Jonathan. Who are these{F801}Unclean Ones?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,59016}You should at least study our creation{F801}lore, Walter. They are the people said{F801}to dwell in the underworld.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,59016}You should at least study our creation{F801}lore, Walter. They are the people said{F801}to dwell in the underworld.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59017}That is why I charge you warriors with{F801}{F804,5}capturing the Black Samurai{F804,0} who seeks{F801}to undermine our kingdom.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59018}For this, you must investigate the{F801}Unclean Ones' country, which is said{F801}to lie in the depths of Naraku.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59017}That is why I charge you warriors with{F801}{F804,5}capturing the Black Samurai{F804,0} who seeks{F801}to undermine our kingdom.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59018}For this, you must investigate the{F801}Unclean Ones' country, which is said{F801}to lie in the depths of Naraku.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,4,1,1}{F813,0,59019}This is a royal decree from King{F801}Ahazuya of Mikado himself.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,4,1,1}{F813,0,59019}This is a royal decree from King{F801}Ahazuya of Mikado himself.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59020}But... entering the depths of Naraku{F801}is against the Samurai code...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59020}But... entering the depths of Naraku{F801}is against the Samurai code...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59021}And if we do venture forth to the{F801}Unclean Ones' country, there is that{F801}legendary demon to consider...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59021}And if we do venture forth to the{F801}Unclean Ones' country, there is that{F801}legendary demon to consider...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59022}This is tyranny from the Monastery!{F801}Does this violation of the code not{F801}give our Commander pause!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F813,0,59022}This is tyranny from the Monastery!{F801}Does this violation of the code not{F801}give our Commander pause!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,4,1,1}{F813,0,59025}The Monastery is ready to provide a{F801}special reward for this mission.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59026}I'll yield the floor to Gabby for{F801}the particulars...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,4,1,1}{F813,0,59025}The Monastery is ready to provide a{F801}special reward for this mission.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59026}I'll yield the floor to Gabby for{F801}the particulars...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Monastery woman\0{F87A,11}{F87B,11,1,1,1}{F813,0,59027}My name is Gabby.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Monastery woman\0{F87A,11}{F87B,11,1,1,1}{F813,0,59027}My name is Gabby.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F87B,11,1,1,1}{F813,0,59028}A request has been established at{F801}K's Tavern regarding the capture of{F801}the Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59029}Refer to the blackboard K keeps there{F801}for the full details.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F87B,11,1,1,1}{F813,0,59028}A request has been established at{F801}K's Tavern regarding the capture of{F801}the Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59029}Refer to the blackboard K keeps there{F801}for the full details.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59030}The Black Samurai's actions are a{F801}sign of contempt for the people of{F801}our kingdom.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59031}I say unto all of you: capture the{F801}Black Samurai for the sake of our{F801}people. That is all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59030}The Black Samurai's actions are a{F801}sign of contempt for the people of{F801}our kingdom.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59031}I say unto all of you: capture the{F801}Black Samurai for the sake of our{F801}people. That is all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,59032}So concludes this emergency meeting.{F801}May you all go your separate ways and{F801}promptly depart on your mission.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}{F87B,8,7,1,1}{F813,0,59032}So concludes this emergency meeting.{F801}May you all go your separate ways and{F801}promptly depart on your mission.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59010}The Black Samurai, who has lately been{F801}on the lips of the public...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59011}Those Casualries who have read her{F801}books are becoming demons.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,59010}The Black Samurai, who has lately been{F801}on the lips of the public...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,59011}Those Casualries who have read her{F801}books are becoming demons.{F801}
